meanings.definition: The appearance or overall character of a town or urban area.
meanings.sent1: The townscapes of our small village are filled with colorful houses and bustling markets.
meanings.sent2: I love walking around the townscapes of New York City, admiring the skyscrapers and busy streets.
meanings.sent3: The townscapes of the old town looked like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the townscapes transformed into a magical world of twinkling lights and shadows.
meanings.sent5: The townscapes etched in my memory were those of the quaint seaside town where I spent my childhood.

meanings.definition: The visual aspects of a town or city, including its buildings, streets, and other features.
meanings.sent1: The townscapes of Paris are famous for their beautiful architecture and charming cafes.
meanings.sent2: Photographers often capture the unique townscapes of different cities to showcase their diversity.
meanings.sent3: The townscapes of the futuristic city were like something out of a sci-fi movie.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a canvas, painting vibrant townscapes of imaginary cities and landscapes.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush strokes brought the townscapes to life on the canvas, each building and street meticulously detailed.
